snippet: A video opened a view on the pitched battles raging between Syrian government soldiers and rebel forces.
abstract: A video opened a view on the pitched battles raging between Syrian government soldiers and rebel forces.
lead_paragraph: A tank bearing two Syrian independence flags at a narrow intersection of trash-strewn streets fired a booming round at an unseen target. A handful of rebel fighters shot machine guns as they darted back and forth between the tank and pock-marked buildings amid a steady volley of bullets.

headline.main: Video of Heavy Street Fighting in Syria

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
